title: An Invention for You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>A device I want you to make, you say?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. You made lots of cream puffs for me the other day, so I wanted to thank you in some way. Is there anything you think would be great if it existed? I would love to make it for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....Now that you mention it, you also made one for Honoka, right? ....Can it be anything?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’ll try my best, whatever it may be. Rina-chan’s board「Motivated」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Then there’s one thing I want. A device that lets me get a perfect score without having to study at all! If I have that, then Eli and the others.... No, never mind.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>What were you going to say about Eli-san and the others?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Umm, Uhh.... I was thinking about letting them use it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You’re so kind, Nico-san.... I admire you. Rina-chan’s board「Amazed」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>O-, of course! Nico is the number one school idol in the universe, after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’ll give it my all to make the device. Ah, there’s something I forgot to mention. Are you prepared, Nico-san? There’s always a risk that comes with trying out new inventions.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
